title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot frontend that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Unofficial registry of community-curated Modelfile recipes (CodeLlama, SQLCoder, Zephyr, etc.).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Avalonia UI (.NET).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into any channel via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert results.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama on NixOS with optional CUDA support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service for CI pipelines to run LLM-based tests.
